ThingDef.label: rustic torch
ThingDef.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: rustic wall torch
ThingDef.description: A wall-mounted wooden torch for lighting an area. It is slightly less brighter than a regular torch lamp, but it can be mounted on walls. Produces a small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: wall oil lamp
ThingDef.description: A wall-mounted metallic oil lamp that shines bright as a regular torch and lasts longer. Can be refueled with tar. Fuel consumption rate is not affected by rain.

ThingDef.label: lamp post
ThingDef.description: A lamp post for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: log chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: log bench (1x2)
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: log bench (1x3)
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: log bench (1x4)
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: rustic round stool
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing.Commonly seen at taverns and inns. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: rustic dining chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: rustic noble chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: end table
ThingDef.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: tall end table
ThingDef.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_SingleCandleBase
ThingDef.label: candle (tallow)
ThingDef.description: A candle to prevent darkness seeping in your room. Has lower brightness than a regular torch but lasts longer. Can be refueled with animal tallow.

ThingDef.label: candle (wax)
ThingDef.description: A candle to prevent darkness seeping in your room. Has lower brightness than a regular torch but lasts longer. Can be refueled with bee wax.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_CandleBase
ThingDef.label: candles (tallow)
ThingDef.description: Candles to prevent darkness seeping in your room. Has lower brightness than a regular torch but lasts longer. Can be refueled with animal tallow.

ThingDef.label: candles (wax)
ThingDef.description: A candle to prevent darkness seeping in your room. Has lower brightness than a regular torch but lasts longer. Can be refueled with bee wax.

ThingDef.label: candlebra
ThingDef.description: A Candelabra to prevent darkness seeping in your room. Has lower brightness than a regular torch but lasts longer. Can be refueled with animal tallow or beeswax.

ThingDef.label: candle stand
ThingDef.description: A candle stand to prevent darkness seeping in your room. Has lower brightness than a regular torch but lasts longer. Can be refueled with tallow or beeswax.

ThingDef.label: oil lamp
ThingDef.description: A metallic oil lamp that shines bright as a regular torch and lasts longer. Can be refueled with tar. Fuel consumption rate is not affected by rain.

ThingDef.label: rustic chest
ThingDef.description: A trusty wooden chest to store your personal belongings. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside. Multiple chests do not stack comfort bonuses.

ThingDef.label: metal strongbox
ThingDef.description: A trusty metal strongbox to store your personal belongings. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside.Multiple chests do not stack comfort bonuses.

ThingDef.label: royal chest
ThingDef.description: An ornate chest store by the nobles. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside. Multiple chests do not stack comfort bonuses.

ThingDef.label: dresser
ThingDef.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: closet
ThingDef.description: A closet to store clothes efficiently and beautifully. Place near beds for a slight comfort bonus

ThingDef.label: closet (1x2)
ThingDef.description: A closet to store clothes efficiently and beautifully. Place near beds for a slight comfort bonus

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_RusticBookshelf
ThingDef.label: small bookshelf
ThingDef.description: Increases research speed when placed near research table. Each research bench can use two small bookshelf.

ThingDef.label: large bookshelf
ThingDef.description: Increases research speed when placed near research table. Each research bench can use one large bookshelf.

ThingDef.label: empty shelf
ThingDef.description: An empty shelf.

ThingDef.label: empty large shelf
ThingDef.description: An empty bookshelf.

ThingDef.label: log bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make log bed. Better than sleeping on bare ground.

ThingDef.label: double log bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make log bed that fits two people. Better than sleeping on bare ground.

ThingDef.label: wicker bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make wicker bed.

ThingDef.label: double wicker bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make wicker bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: straw bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make wicker bed, padded with straw for added comfort.

ThingDef.label: double straw bed
ThingDef.description: A simple and quick to make wicker bed, padded with straw for added comfort that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: fur bed
ThingDef.description: A cozy bed made from pieces of soft and comfy fur.

ThingDef.label: double fur bed
ThingDef.description: A cozy double-wide bed made from pieces of soft and comfy fur that fits two people.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_RusticBedBase
ThingDef.label: rustic bed (red)
ThingDef.description: A rustic comfy bed made up of silk embroidered covers and soft pillows.

ThingDef.Name: DankPyon_RusticDoubleBed_Base
ThingDef.label: rustic double bed (red)
ThingDef.description: A rustic comfy bed made up of silk embroidered covers and soft pillows. Double-wide bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: wood burning stove
ThingDef.description: A small wood burning stove to heat up a small room.

ThingDef.label: hearth
ThingDef.description: A stone hearth for warmth and a homey atmosphere.
